author: antelder
msg: Update the calculator-rmi sample Ant build scripts so that they work and use the simple way to build the sample jar. The calculator-rmi-service build creates an SCA contribution, the calculator-rmi-reference creates an 'unmanaged' jar which use the Node APIs to start a runtime, the only difference in the build.xml is the additional pathelement for the tuscany-node-api jar for the unmanaged one

author: antelder
msg: Have the rmi sample jars included prebuilt in the distro

author: antelder
msg: Add an sca-sontributions.xml file so to the contribution so it works with the launcher

author: antelder
msg: Update the calculator-rmi-reference sample to have a jar manifest main class
